title: Urbanization in Japan 2018
summary: In general Share of urban population has stayed the same over the Year.
Share of urban population is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Share of urban population, about 91.07 was reported at Year 2011
The lowest Share of urban population, of value 89.99 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: Overall Share of urban population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2011.
